alert.note: Alert for West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 20 at 2:41PM MST until December 22 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM WEDNESDAY TO NOON MST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT WEDNESDAY NIGHT TO NOON MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...West Elk and Sawatch Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 6 PM Wednesday to noon MST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from midnight Wednesday night to noon MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
